 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזָה‎</span>] **verb** ==spurt, spatter==; **Hiph\`il** ==sprinkle== (Late Hebrew **Hiph\`il** ***sprinkle***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְדָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַדֵּי‎</span> [[Lev.4.6|Lev 4:6]] and often, for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִזָּה‎</span> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***erupit, stillavit*** [[Isa.63.3|Isa 63:3]], also***prominutt***, etc. [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2291</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִזֶּה‎</span> [[Lev.6.20|Lev 6:20]] (twice in verse), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיֵז‎</span> [[Isa.63.3|Isa 63:3]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּז‎</span> [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53»§ 53</sup>, p. N., 107 bN. and others), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּז‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.33|2Kgs 9:33]] — ***spurt, spatter***, always of blood: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּז מִדָּמָהּ אֶלֿ‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.33|2Kgs 9:33]] ***and some of her blood spurted against*** the wall; so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויז נִצְחָם‎</span> [[Isa.63.3|Isa 63:3]] (with — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> of thing, in metaphor); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִזֶּה מִדָּמָה‎</span> [[Lev.6.20|Lev 6:20]], compare v.[[Lev.6.20|Lev 6:20]] (both with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> of thing). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִזָּת‎</span> consecutive [[Lev.4.6|Lev 4:6]] + 12 t.; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִזֵּיתָ֫‎</span> [[Exod.29.21|Exod 29:21]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַזֶּה‎</span> [[Lev.16.14|Lev 16:14]] ([[Isa.52.15|Isa 52:15]] see below); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּז‎</span> [[Lev.8.11|Lev 8:11]]; [[Lev.8.30|Lev 8:30]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזֵּה‎</span> [[Num.8.7|Num 8:7]] ***Participle*** construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַזֵּה‎</span> [[Num.19.21|Num 19:21]] — ***cause to spurt, sprinkle*** upon, in ceremonials of [[BDB#P|P]]: with accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> person [[Num.8.7|Num 8:7]] (water), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> of thing, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> [[Lev.16.15|Lev 16:15]] object often <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> partitive, or implied in context; followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> [[Lev.5.9|Lev 5:9]]; [[Lev.14.7|Lev 14:7]]; [[Lev.16.14|Lev 16:14]]; [[Lev.16.19|Lev 16:19]] (all of blood); [[Lev.8.11|Lev 8:11]] (oil); [[Num.19.18|Num 19:18]]; [[Num.19.19|Num 19:19]] (water), [[Exod.29.21|Exod 29:21]]; [[Lev.8.30|Lev 8:30]] (both blood and oil); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> [[Lev.14.51|Lev 14:51]] (blood and water), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלנֹֿכַח פְּנֵי‎</span> [[Num.19.4|Num 19:4]] (blood); followed by<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> [[Lev.4.6|Lev 4:6]]; [[Lev.4.17|Lev 4:17]]; [[Lev.16.14|Lev 16:14]] (blood), [[Lev.14.16|Lev 14:16]]; [[Lev.14.27|Lev 14:27]] (oil); once without preposition <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַזֵּה‎</span> [[Num.19.21|Num 19:21]] ***the sprinkler of*** the water. — [[Isa.52.15|Isa 52:15]] see II.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נזה‎</span>. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזָה‎</span>] **verb** (dubious) ==spring, leap== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***leap, leap up, upon*** [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Frey|Frey]]<sup>Prov</sup> Arabic 1, 171. 297; 22, 138; 25, 11); — hence, according to many, **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֵּן יַזֶּה גּוֺיִם רַבִּים‎</span> [[Isa.52.15|Isa 52:15]] ***so shall he cause to leap*** (i.e. in joyful surprise, or = ***startle***) ***many nations***; but perhaps corrupt; [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Comm.</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַתֵּר‎</span> in like sense; &lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְגְּזוּ‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יזהגוים‎</span>) ***many shall tremble*** (v,<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגז‎</span>), [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]<sup>JBL 1890, 216 ff.</sup> compare [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזִיד‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זיד‎</span>
